title: [Ta'Vaalor, Amaranth Wey]
description: The crowded intersection of wey and var teems with people, each hurrying in his or her own direction.  A row of pennants of the Vaalor ruby and gold colors flutter atop the nearby city gate, bringing cheer to the otherwise austere limestone edifice.

The normally crowded intersection of wey and var is nearly deserted, the few who are abroad hurrying towards their destinations.  A row of pennants of the Vaalor ruby and gold colors flutter atop the nearby city gate, dark and shimmering in the pale light cast from the night sky.

The normally crowded intersection of wey and var is nearly deserted, the few who are abroad hurrying towards their destinations.  A row of pennants of the Vaalor crimson and gold colors flutter atop the nearby Vermilion Gate, dark and shimmering in the pale light cast from the night sky.  A crisp white pavilion stands to one side of the Gate, while a small square building stands on the other, their front walls creating a corridor through which the crowds pass.

The crowded intersection of wey and var teems with people, each hurrying in his or her own direction.  A row of pennants of the Vaalor crimson and gold colors flutter atop the nearby Vermilion Gate, bringing cheer to the otherwise austere limestone edifice.
